subject: Re: Just teh fact!
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text:
Hi All, Babiarz3, I doubt that "they" gave Chris Moon a "Frank's Box" to use/abuse it (without Authorization or Rights) to start up, a For-Profit making, business(es), which IS what Chris Moon has done! It was ment for testing purposes or research only!  =Judy=                            . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "babiarz3" <babiarz3@...> wrote:
>
> As far as I know, Chris was asked to take the box and was told that
> "they" wanted him to have it. I don't think "they" said to have him
> take it on loan like a library book.
> 
> And just so I understand correctly... Everyone but Chris is allowed to
> state his opinions. Is that right?
> 
>
